existing_features.title: Deploy the application (frontend + backend canisters) to the Internet Computer mainnet so it is publicly accessible without local tooling.
Provide the public URL for the deployed app in a human-readable form within the repository (e.g., in a root-level README) and ensure it matches the deployed frontend canister URL.
Add an in-app “Share” area that displays the current page URL and allows copying it to the clipboard, so users can easily share the publicly accessible link.

new_feature_requests.summary: Publish the app and provide a publicly accessible URL for everyone to view

projectName: Publish the app and provide a publicly accessible URL
